# AVSpeechSynthesisProviderVoice

**Class**

An object that represents a voice that an audio unit provides to its host.

## Declaration

```swift
class AVSpeechSynthesisProviderVoice
```

## Overview

This is a voice that an [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVSpeechSynthesisProviderAudioUnit] provides to the system, distinct from [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVSpeechSynthesisVoice]. Use [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVSpeechSynthesisProviderAudioUnit/speechVoices] to access the underlying [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVSpeechSynthesisVoice] in the voice quality [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVSpeechSynthesisVoiceQuality/enhanced].

## Creating a voice

- **init(name:identifier:primaryLanguages:supportedLanguages:)**: Creates a voice with a name, an identifier, and language information.

## Inspecting a voice

- **age**: The age of the voice, in years.
- **gender**: The gender of the voice.
- **AVSpeechSynthesisVoiceGender**: The gender for a voice.
- **identifier**: The unique identifier for the voice.
- **name**: The localized name of the voice.
- **primaryLanguages**: A list of BCP 47 codes that identify the languages the synthesizer uses.
- **supportedLanguages**: A list of BCP 47 codes that identify the languages a voice supports.
- **version**: The version of the voice.
- **voiceSize**: The size of the voice package on disk, in bytes.

## Updating a voice

- **updateSpeechVoices()**: Updates the voices your app provides to the system.

## Getting and setting voices

- **speechVoices**: A list of voices the audio unit provides to the system.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSCoding
- NSCopying
- NSObjectProtocol
- NSSecureCoding
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
